title:
Introducing Justia Chat
The Newest Addition to Justia Elevate!
description: Justia Chat is an AI-powered lead generation tool designed to streamline interactions with potential clients on your website. Using natural language processing, this virtual assistant engages visitors and gathers pertinent information, transforming it into actionable leads for your law firm.
Contact us or reply to this message if you'd like to try out Justia Chat on your website!

Keep in mind, this is our initial release, with more customization options coming soon. Currently, Justia Chat is complimentary with your Justia Elevate website, though this may change in the future. As this is AI-based, Justia is not responsible for the content of the chat conversation.
